mapper.select: SELECT PLUGINS_ID AS pluginsId,TITLE AS title,PACK_NAME AS packName,CLASS_NAME AS className,METHOD AS method,REMARK AS remark,STATUS AS status, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=CREATE_USER) AS createUserName,CREATE_TIME AS createTime,CREATE_USER AS createUser FROM BPM_PLUGINS_REGISTER WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} ORDER BY SORT_NO ASC;
